Pattern Library

hero component

IMAGES:

We recommend a minimum image width of 1600px for this component.

RULES & DEPENDENCIES:

This component will have fields for:

  • image
  • mobile image (optional - if not given, the desktop image will be displayed)
  • size: can be large or small, large is the default (optional)
  • alignment: can be left or center (optional - center is the default)

EXAMPLES:
